message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $11,500.  What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is significantly below its true worth.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my target price. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,800?
